title: Total Force on Car and Boat
body: A $$1100$$ kg car pulls a boat on a trailer. What total force resists the motion of the car, boat, and trailer, if the car exerts a $$1900$$ N force on the road and produces an acceleration of $$0.550$$ $$\frac{m}{s^2}$$? The mass of the boat plus trailer is $$700$$ kg.
